description.p: As a member of the Talon Society, you have honed your skills in the art of poaching and hunting rare and exotic creatres for valuable materials and resources. Whether you were born into this secretive organization or joined its ranks later in life, you have dedicated yourself to the pursuit of dangerous prey and the thrill of the hunt.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Poisoner's Kit; Choose one from Alchemist's Supplies, Calligrapher's Supplies, Tinker's Tools
Equipment: Hunting trap, skinning knife, set of common clothes, trophy from an animal you killed, letter of introduction from a black market dealer, pouch with 10 gp

b.big: As a member of the Talon Society you are granted additional features:

setters.set: Nature, Survival, Poisoner's Kit, Alchemist's Supplies/Calligrapher's Supplies/Tinker's Tools

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I am impulsive and act on my whims without thinking about the consequences. (Chaotic)
I am always looking for new experiences and adventures. (Neutral)
I enjoy seeing others suffer and will do whatever it tkaes to achieve my goals. (Evil)
I love to live life on the edge and take risks.
I am calm under pressure and can keep a level head in dangerous situations. (Neutral)
I have no qualms about taking down any creature if it means putting good on the table. (Neutral)
I don't take kindly to those who question my methods. (Neutral)
I will betray anyone, even fellow poachers, if it benefits me. (Evil)

select.name: Ideals
select.item: Unity. The Talon Society unites us towards a common goal, and that unity is essential for our success. (Neutral)
Innovation. We must constantly innovate challenge the status quo to remain ahead of our enemies. (Neutral)
Unpredictability. By being unpredictable, we keep our enemies on their toes and gain an advantage. (Chaotic)
Anarchy. The Talon Society should be dissolved, and each member should be free to pursue their own interests. (Chaotic)
Control. We must control all aspects of the Talon Society and ensure that no one can challenge our authority. (Evil)
Dominance. We must assert our power over other factions and make them bow to our will. (Evil)

select.name: Bonds
select.item: I am in debt to the Talon Society and will do whatever they ask of me to repay it.
I have a deep seated hatred for authority figures and will always work to undermine them.
I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
I am on a personal mission to uncover a conspiracy within the Talon Society.
I am fiercly loyal to the Talon Society and will do anything to protect its secrets.
I have a close relationship wit a fellow agent, and we work together to complete our missions.

select.name: Flaws
select.item: I am distrustful of those outside of the Talon Society.
I am prone to overthinking and second-guessing myself, which can lead to mistakes.
I am secretive about my methods and information, even to those I work closely with.
I can be overly critical and judgemental of others.
I can be indecisive and struggle to act when needed.
I am easily bored, and often seek out new challenges and afventures regardless of the danger.

description.p: You have a network of contacts within the criminall underworld who can help you seel your poachedd goods. You can sell animal parts for 50% more than their normal market value, but only if you can find a willing buyer.
